title: complete user profile registration
description: Test the /api/profile/complete POST endpoint to ensure it correctly completes user registration with all required profile data including user_id, email, name, user_type, department, and optional fields like year, prn, phone, address, and face_image. Verify successful completion response and data persistence.

title: update user profile photo
description: Test the /api/profile/update-photo POST endpoint to verify that it accepts a base64 encoded image and updates the user's profile photo correctly. Validate that the photo is stored and reflected properly for the given user_id and user_type.
